Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to installing safety signs near schools

A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring the installation of traffic calming devices adjacent to senior centers and naturally occurring retirement communities.
Items.MatterName: Requiring the installation of traffic calming devices adjacent to senior centers and naturally occurring retirement communities.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to pedestrian safety reporting
A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring the department of transportation to annually implement new daylighting measures
Items.MatterName: Requiring the department of transportation to annually implement new daylighting measures.

Items.Title: Resolution calling on the New York State Legislature to pass, and the New York State Governor to sign, S.315/A.1416, which would authorize New York City to set a five mile per hour speed limit on streets participating in the Open Streets program
Items.MatterName: Authorize New York City to set a five mile per hour speed limit on streets participating in the Open Streets program. (S.315/A.1416)

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the installation of bollards at reconstructed sidewalks, curb extensions and pedestrian ramps
Items.MatterName: Installation of bollards at reconstructed sidewalks, curb extensions and pedestrian ramps.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring a study of dangerous driving
Items.MatterName: Requiring a study of dangerous driving.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring the installation of reflective material on bollards, curbs, posts, and roundabouts
Items.MatterName: Requiring the installation of reflective material on bollards, curbs, posts, and roundabouts.
